channel.title: Spells Require Runes
channel.description:
Hey everyone,
How can i make spells require runes? just post a link to a tut or explain how to do it here.
Thanks

item.title: Spells Require Runes
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“ownage plz, post:5, topic:118308”]add if(playerHasItemAmount(####, #)) {

under the spell then at the end add another }

change the #'s to the id of the rune and the second one to the amount …

also you might want to add deleteItem(####, getItemSlot(####), #);

change the first 2 #'s to the id of the rune and the last # to the amount

if you want to have it require more than 1 rune add another playerHasItemAmount(####, #) before the last )

so it would look like if(playerHasItemAmount(####, #) && playerHasItemAmount(####, #)) {

and add another deleteitem

EDIT: also next time post in the developement / help section instead of moparscape questions[/quote]

Thanks heaps for your help ;D

Read full topic

add if(playerHasItemAmount(####, #)) {

under the spell then at the end add another }

change the #'s to the id of the rune and the second one to the amount …

also you might want to add deleteItem(####, getItemSlot(####), #);

change the first 2 #'s to the id of the rune and the last # to the amount

if you want to have it require more than 1 rune add another playerHasItemAmount(####, #) before the last )

so it would look like if(playerHasItemAmount(####, #) && playerHasItemAmount(####, #)) {

and add another deleteitem

EDIT: also next time post in the developement / help section instead of moparscape questions
